About.Title: About Me
About.P1: I am driven by a constant curiosity for new technologies. Whether it is refining my home lab setup or diving into a new programming ecosystem, I am always looking to expand my technical horizons.
About.P2: When I step away from the keyboard, I am an avid reader of speculative fiction and a dedicated supporter of the Montreal Canadiens (on YouTube Game Highlights). I am also an advocate of green tea and honey over coffee.
